notes.title: Authors’ contributions
notes.p: XZ and HH conceived of and designed the study, revised the manuscript for important intellectual content, performed the literature search and performed the comparison. XZ performed the comparison shown in Table 1. MNperformed the autodock calculations to find the binding sites and energies and prepared the manuscript. DZ generated the figures and tables and performed the background research. MY, PZ and MZ edited the manuscript. XZ and HH drafted the manuscript. All authors have read and approved the content of the manuscript.
